Container.Name: MPEG transport stream (MPEG-TS, MTS, TS)
Container.Spec: MPEG-2 Part 1, Systems; ISO/IEC 13818-1; ITU-T Rec. H.222.0

VideoFormat.Name: H.264 elementary stream
VideoFormat.Notes: Media samples contain a fragmented H.264 bitstream.

VideoFormat.Name: JPEG-LS custom FOURCC for avi - decoder
JPEG-LS custom FOURCC for avi - encoder

PixelFormat.Name: YV12
PixelFormat.Notes: I420/IYUV with U and V planes switched.

PixelFormat.Name: YVU9
PixelFormat.Notes: U and V are sampled every 4 pixels horizontally and vertically (sometimes referred to as 16:1:1). The V plane appears before the U plane.

AudioFormat.Name: Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) in Audio Data Transport Stream (ADTS) format
Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) in Audio Data Transport Stream (ADTS) format (HDCP)
High-Efficiency Advanced Audio Coding (HE-AAC)
AudioFormat.Notes: MPEG-2 AAC or MPEG-4 HE-AAC v1/v2 streams with any payload (ADTS, ADIF, LOAS/LATM, RAW). Format block includes MP4 AudioSpecificConfig()

AudioFormat.Name: MPEG-4 audio transport stream with a synchronization layer (LOAS) and a multiplex layer (LATM)
Windows Media Audio 9 Lossless or Windows Media Audio 9.1
Windows Media Audio 9 Professional over S/PDIF
Encrypted audio data used with secure audio path.
ITU-T G.722.2, Adaptive Multi-Rate Wideband Plus
